replies.bodyText:
your change here seems to have created incorrect ordering,
static imports should be on top:
https://google.github.io/styleguide/javaguide.html#s3.3.3-import-ordering-and-spacing
replies.author: zohrehj

timeline.message:
changed the datasource url

changed the datasource url

timeline.bodyText: let's keep this as 'update' for now
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,53 +1,47 @@
+#spring configurations
+spring.profiles.active=@spring.profiles.active@
+spring.main.allow-bean-definition-overriding=true
+
 logging.level.root=INFO
 logging.level.com.google.cloud.healthcare.fdamystudies=ERROR
 
 # log configuration
-logging.path=/tmp/var/log
-logging.file=${logging.path}/consent-management-server.log
+logging.path=${LOG_PATH}
+logging.file=${logging.path}/consent_mgmt_service.log
 logging.file.max-size= 1024KB
 
-#dev
-#spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/${DB_NAME}?autoReconnect=true&characterEncoding=utf8&useSSL=false
 spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/${DB_NAME}?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true&autoReconnect=true&characterEncoding=utf8&useSSL=false&allowPublicKeyRetrieval=true
 spring.datasource.username=${DB_USER}
 spring.datasource.password=${DB_PASS}
+spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
+# JPA 
+spring.jpa.database-platform=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5InnoDBDialect
+spring.jpa.show-sql=false
+spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=none

timeline.bodyText: this flag should be flipped in the PR that integrates with audit log, why is it being flipped here?
timeline.author: zohrehj
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,53 +1,47 @@
+#spring configurations
+spring.profiles.active=@spring.profiles.active@
+spring.main.allow-bean-definition-overriding=true
+
 logging.level.root=INFO
 logging.level.com.google.cloud.healthcare.fdamystudies=ERROR
 
 # log configuration
-logging.path=/tmp/var/log
-logging.file=${logging.path}/consent-management-server.log
+logging.path=${LOG_PATH}
+logging.file=${logging.path}/consent_mgmt_service.log
 logging.file.max-size= 1024KB
 
-#dev
-#spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/${DB_NAME}?autoReconnect=true&characterEncoding=utf8&useSSL=false
 spring.datasource.url=jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:3306/${DB_NAME}?createDatabaseIfNotExist=true&autoReconnect=true&characterEncoding=utf8&useSSL=false&allowPublicKeyRetrieval=true
 spring.datasource.username=${DB_USER}
 spring.datasource.password=${DB_PASS}
+spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
+# JPA 
+spring.jpa.database-platform=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5InnoDBDialect
+spring.jpa.show-sql=false
+spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=none
 
 # Hikari specific settings, to keep the connection alive if idle for a long time (needed in production)
 spring.datasource.type=com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource
 spring.datasource.hikari.connection-test-query=SELECT 1
 spring.datasource.hikari.idle-timeout=1000
 spring.datasource.hikari.minimum-idle=5
 spring.datasource.hikari.maximum-pool-size=50
-spring.datasource.driver-class-name=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
-spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.dialect=org.hibernate.dialect.MySQL5InnoDBDialect
-
-# JPA 
-spring.jpa.show-sql=true
-spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update
-spring.jpa.hibernate.naming.strategy=org.hibernate.cfg.ImprovedNamingStrategy
-
 
 # EMBEDDED SERVER CONFIGURATION
 server.servlet.context-path=/myStudiesConsentMgmtWS
-
 #local to run
 server.port=8089
 
 # HTTP encoding
 spring.http.encoding.charset=UTF-8
-
 spring.jmx.enabled = false
 
-#Pdf Uploaded File Path
-consentPdfUploadPath=/webapps/consentDucmentPdfFiles
-
-security.oauth2.client.client-id= oauth-scim-client-id
-security.oauth2.client.client-secret= oauth-scim-client-secret
-security.oauth2.introspection_endpoint=http://localhost:8002/oauth-scim-service/oauth2/introspect
-
 #cloud storage bucket name
 bucketName=${GCP_BUCKET_NAME}
 
-spring.main.allow-bean-definition-overriding=true
+security.oauth2.client.client-id=${CONSENT_MGMT_CLIENT_ID}
+security.oauth2.client.client-secret=${CONSENT_MGMT_CLIENT_SECRET}
+security.oauth2.introspection_endpoint=${HYDRA_ADMIN_URL}/oauth2/introspect
+
+#Enabale/Disable components from common service
 commonservice.email.enabled = false
-commonservice.auditlogevent.enabled=false
+commonservice.auditlogevent.enabled=true

replies.bodyText: My Bad.. This property is no more use as we are moving GCP stackdriver, hence removed this property now
replies.author: aswinijena100
